title: Jocko Podcast 19 - with Echo Charles | Bullying | Enabling | Over-Detachment
description:
Join the conversation on Twitter: @jockowillink @echocharles 

0:00:00 – Opening

0:03:06 – Book Review. “Red Blood, Black Sand,” by Chuck Tatum

1:12:25 – Internet stuff / Onnit

1:15:05 – Thoughts on OVER-detachment

1:24:00 – Bullying. What if your child is being bullied?

1:29:07 – How to deal with a forced environment.  School, etc.

1:39:15 –  Does leadership require theatrics/acting?

1:44:05 – Helping VS Enabling.  When to cut ties.

1:52:03 – As a new leader, dealing with not knowing everything.

1:57:45 – Use of force.  Police, security, etc.

2:15:56 – Aggressive VS proactive.
